H0.text: Reading all the directions is the first thing a student should do before starting an experiment.

H1.text: Find a lab partner is the first thing a student should do before starting an experiment.

H2.text: Making notes about observations is the first thing a student should do before starting an experiment.

H3.text: Writing a report on the investigation is the first thing a student should do before starting an experiment.

A4.text: The use of the buddy system for particularly risky operations.
